EmailTemplate.name: Portal Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell us about your experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Partner Portal Survey Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, We are always looking for ways to make our partnership better - and we need your help. We know you have recently logged into our portal and want to get your feedback. Please take a moment to fill out this short, 10-question survey about your experience using the portal so far. We'll use this information to make improvements and updates that can benefit you and your clients. Thank you for your time. Let's get started! Contact us at (888) 980-2898
